activity_differential: people walking and carrying goods in a busy market
camera moving through and overtaking people in a crowded outdoor market
individuals transporting items and interacting in a public space
description: A busy outdoor market scene with multiple people walking, carrying items, and the camera moving forward through the crowd. Some individuals are carrying large loads on their heads or in their hands, and the camera weaves through the market, passing by and overtaking people.
